We've come a long way since 1619. But disparities created by slavery persist today. All Americans must grapple with this history, confront honestly where our country went wrong, and reflect upon what it will take to fully heal. #400YearsLater

2019 marks 400 years since the first African slaves were brought to what is now American soil in 1619. Slavery would last another 246 years – 3 years longer than the United States has been a country. #400YearsLater
